name: Fire I
core: A first spark suggests initiative is available.
shadow: The spark scatters when enthusiasm outruns discipline.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward beginning without delay.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests preserving strength before acting.

name: Fire II
core: Effort builds steadily when attention remains focused.
shadow: Effort burns unevenly when distraction claims the center.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates sustained work is favored.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests limiting the scope of the effort.

name: Fire III
core: Skill and effort can be brought into workable alignment.
shadow: Alignment fails when pride refuses adjustment.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward skillful execution.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests correcting the plan before exertion.

name: Fire IV
core: Reserves matter more than display at this stage.
shadow: Protection becomes hoarding when no fuel is spent at the right time.
astralNote: Its astral note suggests choosing one decisive effort.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports conserving energy.

name: Fire V
core: An internal strain suggests the pace may need correction.
shadow: Strain becomes collapse when warning signs are dismissed.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates action should be narrowed and targeted.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests recovery before escalation.

name: Fire VI
core: Recognition suggests the present work is visible and gaining force.
shadow: Recognition distorts judgment when it becomes the goal.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates confident forward motion.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests separating substance from praise.

name: Fire VII
core: Defensive effort suggests standing firm without losing proportion.
shadow: Defense becomes needless conflict when every pressure is treated as attack.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward a focused defense.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests choosing which pressures deserve resistance.

name: Fire VIII
core: Rapid developments suggest timing matters as much as force.
shadow: Speed becomes confusion when sequence is ignored.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates timely action has value now.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests slowing just enough to preserve precision.

name: Fire IX
core: Endurance suggests more strength remains than first appears.
shadow: Endurance becomes depletion when rest is treated as failure.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates one more effort may matter.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports recovery and measured protection.

name: Fire X
core: Burden suggests the present load may be beyond its proper proportion.
shadow: Burden becomes collapse when nothing is relinquished.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates the load should be redistributed before action.
umbralNote: Its umbral note strongly supports release and reprioritization.
